Pre-departure Travel Curtailment due to COVID-19

If participants are unable to attend the event due to COVID restrictions, they will still be able to take part in the event virtually. 


In such instances, a Goodwill Payout of US$100 be made to the participant. Payout amount will be subject to bank charges and applicable processing fees to the original mode of payment. 


Goodwill Payout will only be made to participants who are unable to travel and attend the event in-person due to COVID policies beyond their control. Proof of travel curtailment includes official PCR/ART test report, government-issued travel advisory and/or restriction, university-issued travel restriction, city or country lockdown notice, and mandatory quarantine notice. Travel disruptions arising from personal negligence such as failure to comply with COVID-19 travel requirements will not be entitled to the Goodwill Payout.


Cancellation:
Tickets once purchased are not refundable. 


No show:

Tickets once purchased are not refundable.


No Change:

This tickets allow admission to only this event. Tickets to this event is non-transferrable.


Force Majeur

In the event that Asian BP cannot be held due to reasons beyond the control of the organisers, the event will transit to a 100% online event.


In such instance, a Goodwill Payout of US$100 be made to every participant. Payout amount will be subject to bank charges and applicable processing fees to the original mode of payment. 


Disclaimer:

Rights of admission are reserved with the organizer.

The organiser reserves the right to alter the schedule of the event without prior notice

The event is subject to force majeure conditions.

In order to maintain high quality of user experience, EduDrift may collect certain information (including but not limited to personally identifiable information) from you such as name, e-mail address or telephone number at the time of booking/registration/payment. By agreeing to participate in the event, you hereby give your consent to EduDrift to collect, receive, possess, store, deal and handle all information as provided herein for its own purposes.

> EduDrift does not assume any responsibility with regards to any injury or complications due to COVID – 19 accrued as a result of your participation.
